track.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a narrow path or road with a rough uneven surface, especially one made by people or animals frequently moving through the same place

track.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a circular course around which runners, cars etc race, which often has a specially prepared surface

track.translation[0].definitions[6].defi: all the sports in an athletics competition such as running, jumping, or throwing the javelin

track.translation[0].definitions[7].defi: the direction or line taken by something as it moves
track.translation[0].definitions[7].exam: islands that lie in the track of North Atlantic storms
